name: WGJ Week 117 - I am not a bug!
name_original: WGJ Week 117 - I am not a bug!
description:
Weekly Game Jam, Week 117: I am NOT a bug!

First attempt at a Game Jam, thanks to my teammates Tespy and Mailto // Asher. Lots of improvements to be made for the next one.

Prompt for UI setting on run of the exe. In game controls are "A" and "D" for movement, "W" for jump, and "E" for use.

Available in .zip and .7z formats. run "NotABug.exe" after extraction.

Special thanks to https://www.kenney.nl for the tile sprites.
